name: Notr
description:
Notr, the app which allows you to note down anything you ever wanted, all with just the click of a few buttons, and oh, did I mention that it's free? You can write essays and essays of information, for many different reasons, like school, work, homework, etc, all with stunning visuals and smooth animations. There's no reason not to try it, so download it for free, today!

To exit the game,  right click on the icon in the taskbar, then select Close Window, or press Ctrl + Alt + Tab, then, click the X mark next to the application.

All logos except for the main app logo were personally handcrafted by yours truly in Paint 3-D.

Unzip and run the file which says Notr.exe to run the app.
